intro: Vantanea contracta var. grandiflora, commonly known as the grandiflora variant of the species, is a flowering plant characterized by its showy, large blooms. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is native to tropical regions of South America. The plant typically features dense, evergreen foliage and produces clusters of tubular flowers that attract pollinators such as birds and insects. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardens and horticultural collections.
